trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 对象集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods enable you to add and remove individual controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法使你能够添加和从集合中删除单独的控件。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> methods to add or remove all the controls from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A>方法来添加或从集合中移除所有控件。

trans-unit.source: You can determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is a member of the collection by passing the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以确定是否<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>是通过将传递到该控件的集合的成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Contains%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To get the index value of the location of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> in the collection, pass the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要获取的位置的索引值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>在集合中，将传递到该控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOf%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The collection can be copied into an array by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 集合可以通过调用复制到数组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.CopyTo%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> to which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> belongs.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 所属的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> containing the initial controls for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 类型的数组，包含此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 的初始控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> class with the specified container <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> and the specified array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的容器 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 和指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> 控件的数组初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="owner" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="owner" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 上显示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that displays the specified image to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将显示指定图像的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that displays the specified text to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将显示指定文本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to add to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合末尾的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified item to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的项添加到集合末尾。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> representing the zero-based index of the new item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示集合中新项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 上显示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that displays the specified image and text to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将显示指定图像和文本的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The text to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 上显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to be displayed on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 上显示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> that displays the specified image and text to the collection and that raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 将显示指定图像和文本并引发 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 事件的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click" /> 添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> controls to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 控件添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 控件的数组。

trans-unit.source: Adds an array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> controls to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 控件的数组添加到集合中。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> to copy a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> array to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 请使用此重载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>复制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>数组到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Use the overload of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> parameter to merge one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> with another.
trans-unit.target: 使用的重载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>采用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>参数合并一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>与另一个。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="toolStripItems" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="toolStripItems" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> to be added to the current collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到当前集合的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> to the current collection.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 添加到当前集合中。

trans-unit.source: Use this overload of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> to merge one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> with another.
trans-unit.target: 请使用此重载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>到合并一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>与另一个。

trans-unit.source: You typically use this method with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>, and you can easily use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Insert%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A> methods to modify the merged <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 你通常使用此方法与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>，并且你可以轻松地使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Insert%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A>方法，以便修改合并<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: Use the overload of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> array to copy an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> controls to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 使用的重载<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>采用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>要复制的数组，数组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>控件添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="toolStripItems" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="toolStripItems" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除所有项。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove the entire collection of controls from a parent control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A>方法以从父控件中删除的控件的整个集合。

trans-unit.source: To remove an individual control from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从集合中移除的单个控件，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> controls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>控件添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear" /> method to ensure that all the controls are removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear" />方法，以确保，从集合中移除所有控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to search for in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 中搜索的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified item is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定项是否为集合的成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> is a member of the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 是当前 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 的成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The key to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 中定位的键。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the collection contains an item with the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 确定集合是否包含具有指定键的项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> contains a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> with the specified key; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 包含具有指定键的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `key` parameter value corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: `key`参数值对应于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to which to copy the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要将集合复制到的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 类型的数组。

trans-unit.source: The position in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> array at which to paste the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要粘贴集合的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 数组中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection into the specified position of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> array.
trans-unit.target: 将集合复制到指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 数组的指定位置。

trans-unit.source: The item name to search the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> for.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 中搜索的项的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to search child items of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> specified by the <c>key</c> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要搜索由 <c>key</c> 参数指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的子项，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Searches for items by their name and returns an array of all matching controls.
trans-unit.target: 根据项名称搜索项，并返回所有匹配控件的数组。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> array of the search results.
trans-unit.target: 搜索结果的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 数组。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="key" /> parameter is <see langword="null" /> or empty.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" /> 或为空。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 中定位的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the specified item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 检索集合中指定项的索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the position of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 中找到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />，则为表示该项位置的从零开始的索引值；如果未找到，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的名称。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the index of the first occurrence of the specified item within the collection.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定项在集合中的第一个匹配项的索引。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the position of the first occurrence of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> specified by the <paramref name="key" /> parameter, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到 <paramref name="key" /> 参数指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的第一个匹配项，则为表示该项位置的从零开始的索引值；如果未找到，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: The `key` parameter value corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: `key`参数值对应于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOfKey%2A>连续，最后调用返回索引将首先，检查的键的匹配项，如果没有匹配项，从集合的开头开始搜索。

trans-unit.source: The location in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> at which to insert the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 要将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 插入到 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified item into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的项插入集合中的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 是否为只读。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> is read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="true" /> 是只读的，则为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定索引处的项。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的项的索引（索引从零开始）。

trans-unit.source: Gets the item at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定索引处的项。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> located at the specified position in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 中指定位置的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the item to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的项的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the item with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有指定名称的项。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名称的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to remove from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 要从 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定的项。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>从删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>，所有后续的控件将上移集合中的一个位置。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method, or remove all controls by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法或移除所有控件通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>的对象添加到集合中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的索引值。

trans-unit.source: Removes an item from the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中的指定索引处移除项。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>从删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>，所有后续的控件将上移集合中的一个位置。

trans-unit.source: You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A> method, or remove all controls by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A>方法或移除所有控件通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>的对象添加到集合中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: The key of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> 的键。

trans-unit.source: Removes the item that has the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 移除具有指定键的项。

trans-unit.source: The `key` parameter value corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: `key`参数值对应于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection" /> 为只读。

trans-unit.source: The item to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到集合中的项。

trans-unit.source: Adds an item to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 向集合中添加一项。

trans-unit.source: The location at which <paramref name="value" /> was inserted.
trans-unit.target: 插入 <paramref name="value" /> 的位置。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Removes all items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除所有项。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The item to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中定位的项。

trans-unit.source: Determines if the collection contains a specified item.
trans-unit.target: 确定集合中是否包含指定的项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is contained in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合中包含 <paramref name="value" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The item to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要在集合中定位的项。

trans-unit.source: Determines the location of a specified item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定集合中指定项的位置。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item in the collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到项，则为集合中该项的索引；否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert <c>value</c>.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的索引，在该处插入 <c>value</c>。

trans-unit.source: The item to insert into the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要插入到集合中的项。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an item into the collection at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将某个项插入到集合中的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示集合是否具有固定大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection has a fixed size; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该集合具有固定大小，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to get.
trans-unit.target: 要获取的项的索引（索引从零开始）。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the element at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定索引处的元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 位于指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The item to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中移除的项。

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specified item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中移除指定项的第一个匹配项。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the item to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的项的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Removes an item from the collection at a specified index.
trans-unit.target: 移除集合中指定索引处的项。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Collections.IList> 接口时使用。
